en.title: **Salesforce Development Lead/ Solution Designer**
en.text:
• Created UI pages using Lightning Web Components (LWC) based on business requirements. Worked extensively with Lightning Web Components, utilizing Decorators, Wire service, Lightning Data Service, Event handling, Lightning Design System, Navigation Service, Salesforce Field Service Lightning, and Einstein Bots.
• Implemented SoftPhone Integration outside the Salesforce System using Google Contact Center.
• Integrated third-party customer support systems into salesforce using RESTful APIs to centralize service requests and streamline operations.
• Implemented the Snowflake integration with the Analytics Studio to pass the data to downstream systems and archiving purposes.

en.title: **Salesforce Development Lead**
en.text:
•• Collaborated with project stakeholders to comprehend business requirements and translate them into technical designs and solutions.
• Designed end-to-end Salesforce solutions in alignment with project objectives, emphasizing scalability, performance, and security.
• Worked extensively with Lightning Web Components, utilizing Decorators, Wire service, @api, @track, @wire, Lightning Data Service, Event handling, Lightning Design System, Navigation Service, Salesforce Field Service Lightning, and Einstein Bots.

en.title: **Salesforce Lead**
en.info: Deloitte Assets & Solutions Group , Hyderabad, India
en.text:
• Applied hands-on experience in implementing Omnistudio features to swiftly develop forms aligned with business requirements.
• Utilized Decision Matrix to analyze customer inputs and determine outcomes effectively.
• Enhanced pages using standard features like Actionable Relationship Center and Action Plans, among others.
• Implemented various advanced fields and setup SSO with SAML 2.0 for integration with internal and third-party applications.
• Practiced modular development to create reusable package components for enhanced code maintainability and scalability.

en.title: ** Sr Salesforce Developer / Admin **
en.text:
• Developed code to identify and merge case duplicates based on business requirements.
• Enhanced code for greater generality and modularity.
• Produced a Technical Design Document.
• Implemented Objects, Page Layouts, Record Types, Relationships, Validation Rules, Workflows, and Approval Processes.

en.title: **Salesforce Technical Lead**
en.text:
• Developed Customer 360 View using Vlocity (Omnistudio) to facilitate easy access to Agent, Agency, and Policy Information.
• Led multiple Salesforce implementation projects, integrating Client 360 features to provide unified customer experiences and drive business value.
• Implemented Avaya and Connects for CISCO Integration API to address business requirements for Customer Telephony (CTI).
• Developed Knowledge Article Management Page as per Business Requirements.
